name: ObservedChangesCS
title: Observed Changes CodeSystem
description: Observed changes in an abnormality code system.

concept.definition:
[PR] Decrease in calcifications

Valid for the following modalities: MG.

[PR] Decrease in number
There is a decrease in the number of calcifications found in this mammogram versus 
the prior mammogram. 

Valid for the following modalities: MG.

[PR] Decrease in size

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI NM.

[PR] Increase in calcifications

Valid for the following modalities: MG.

[PR] Increase in number
There is an increase in the number of calcifications found in this mammogram versus 
the prior mammogram. 

Valid for the following modalities: MG.

[PR] Increase in size

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI NM.

[PR] Less prominent

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI.

[PR] More prominent

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI.

[PR] New

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI NM.

[PR] No longer seen
The lesion or mass is no longer seen from previous Mammogram, Ultrasound and/or MRI. 

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI.

[PR] Not significant changed

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI NM.

[PR] Partially removed

Valid for the following modalities: MG.

[PR] Represents change

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI NM.

[PR] Stable
The condition has remained stable since the last Mammogram, Ultrasound, MRI or Nuclear 
Medicine exam. 

Valid for the following modalities: MG US MRI.
